article:
A 'database clone' is a complete and separate copy of a database system that
includes the business data, the DBMS software and any other application tiers
that make up the environment. Cloning is a different kind of operation to
replication and backups in that the cloned environment is both fully functional
and separate in its own right. Additionally the cloned environment may be
modified at its inception due to configuration changes or data subsetting.

The cloning refers to the replication of the server in order to have a backup,
to upgrade the environment.
